page.title: 02SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: A great concern of the l980's is vandalism many causes are given - unemployment, boredom, lack of parental discipline. This Spring the Community Centre was so badly vandalised that it had to be demolished - leaving a block of badly damaged garages full of rubbish and broken glass. Previously the centre had been used for many private and public functions. Now the only social amenity left to improve the quality of life in this area is the church which runs youth clubs, bingo sessions and evenings for the handicapped. There is a strong feeling locally about the inadequacies and there have been public meetings to discuss the problems and to set up a Good Neighbour scheme.
